items.sentence: Tom spoke to Mary in private about the matter.

We don\'t get as many customers as we used to.

You\'re the only person I know who owns a gun.
I doubt if Tom will come to my birthday party.
I doubt that Tom would do something like that.
I dropped Tom off at school on my way to work.
Tom didn\'t know how bad Mary wanted to leave.

Tom didn\'t know that Mary could speak French.

Tom thinks that nothing bad can happen to him.
